lines.content: > "why waste you brain space for boring stuff" -nobody
Duke Point O helps you keep track of mundane tasks so that you can free your brain
~~and let them rot~~ for greater stuff!
- Okay I know it sounds boring already
- but I assure you it is **AWESOME**!!1!
- [ ] Read your mind and automatically input tasks
1. Go to my recent [release](https://github.com/bklimey/ip/releases/tag/A-Jar) and download `ip.jar`
1. Open command prompt in the same folder as `ip.jar` and enter `java -jar ip.jar` into the command prompt
*Disclaimer: Not responsible for any mishaps that happens to your computer*

Butler Pooh makes managing tasks a whizz.
- Add 3 different types of task: todo, deadline, event
Adds a *todo* task to the task list.
These are tasks without any date/time attached to it e.g., visit new theme park.
Adds a *deadline* task to the task list.
These are tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time e.g., submit report by 11/10/2019 5pm.
*Note: `<DEADLINE>` should be in `d/m/y hhmm` format e.g.`1/1/2000 1200`*
Adds an *event* task to the task list.
These are tasks that start at a specific time and ends at a specific time e.g., team project meeting on 2/10/2019 2-4pm.
